client.communicator

Class ServerProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.communicator.ServerProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IServer

    public class ServerProxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements IServer
    This class implements the IServer interface, as the way in which the Client is able to communicate with the server via a HTTP connection. This class with package the input parameters for each individual, such that they can sent to the server via a HTTPCommunicator. The response from the HTTPCommunicator will then be unpackaged into the appropriate objects.
    Author:
    Keloric

      • acceptTrade

        public ClientModel acceptTrade(boolean willAccept)
        Description copied from interface: IServer
        This method will send a response to the server for a trade offer given to the client. A new ClientModel will be returned.
        Specified by:
        acceptTrade in interface IServer
        Parameters:
        willAccept -
        Pre-Condition:
        Current player has been offered a domestic trade, To accept the offered trade, current player has the required resources
        Post-Condition:
        If the current player accepted, the current player and the player who offered swap the specified resources, If the current player declined no resources are exchanged, The trade offer is removed

      • discardCards

        public ClientModel discardCards(ResourceList discardedCards)
        Description copied from interface: IServer
        This method will discard a set of cards from the client's hand.
        Specified by:
        discardCards in interface IServer
        Parameters:
        discardedCards -
        Returns:
        Pre-Condition:
        The status of the client model is 'Discarding', The current player has over 7 cards, The current player has the cards the current player is choosing to discard.
        Post-Condition:
        Postconditions, The current player gives up the specified resources, If the current player is the last one to discard, the client model status changes to 'Robbing'

      • buildRoad

        public ClientModel buildRoad(boolean free,
                    EdgeLocation roadLocation)
        Description copied from interface: IServer
        This method will build a road for the client. A new ClientModel will be returned to the client.
        Specified by:
        buildRoad in interface IServer
        Parameters:
        free -
        roadLocation -
        Returns:
        Pre-Condition:
        The road location is open, The road location is connected to another road owned by the player, The road location is not on water, The current player has the required resources (1 wood, 1 brick and 1 road), Setup round: Must be placed by settlement owned by the player with no adjacent road
        Post-Condition:
        The current player lost the resources required to build a road (1 wood, 1 brick and 1 road), The road is on the map at the specified location, If applicable, "Longest Road" has been awarded to the player with the longest road

      • buildSettlement

        public ClientModel buildSettlement(boolean free,

        Description copied from interface: IServer
        This method will build a settlement for the client. A new ClientModel will be returned to the client.
        Specified by:
        buildSettlement in interface IServer
        Parameters:
        free -
        vertexLocation -
        Returns:
        Pre-Condition:
        The settlement location is open The settlement location is not on water, The settlement location is connected to one of the current player's roads except during setup, The current player has the required resources (1 wood, 1 brick, 1 wheat, 1 sheep and 1 settlement), The settlement cannot be placed adjacent to another settlement

      • buildCity

        public ClientModel buildCity(VertexLocation vertexLocation)
        updates model, builds a city in specified location
        Specified by:
        buildCity in interface IServer
        Pre-Condition:
        the city location is where you currently have a settlement, you have the required resources (2 wheat, 3 ore; 1 city)
        Post-Condition:
        you lost the resources required to build a city (2 wheat, 3 ore; 1 city), the city is on the map at the specified location, you got a settlement back

        Pre-Condition:
        you have the resources you are offering
        Post-Condition:
        the trade is offered to the other player (stored in the server model)

      • maritimeTrade

        public ClientModel maritimeTrade(int ratio,
                        java.lang.String inputResource,
                        java.lang.String outputResource)
        trades resource cards according to a certain ratio
        Specified by:
        maritimeTrade in interface IServer
        Pre-Condition:
        you have the resources you are giving, for ratios less than 4, you have the correct port for the trade
        Post-Condition:
        trade has been executed (offered resources are in the bank, and the requested resource has been received)

      • robPlayer

        public ClientModel robPlayer(HexLocation location,
                    int victimIndex)
        moves the robber, steals a development card from a player
        Specified by:
        robPlayer in interface IServer
        Pre-Condition:
        robber is not being kept in the same location, if a player is being robbed, the player being robbed has resource cards
        Post-Condition:
        robber is in the new location, player being robbed (if any) gave you one of his resource cards (randomly selected)

      • finishTurn

        public ClientModel finishTurn()
        end player's turn, start next payer's turn
        Specified by:
        finishTurn in interface IServer
        Pre-Condition:
        none
        Post-Condition:
        cards in new dev card hand have been transferred to old dev card, it is the next player's turn

      • buyDevCard

        public ClientModel buyDevCard()
        removes resource cards from player, retrieves development card from bank
        Specified by:
        buyDevCard in interface IServer
        Pre-Condition:
        player has the required resources, there is a development card left in the bank
        Post-Condition:
        player has a new development card, if it is monument card, add it to old devcard hand else, add it to new devcard hand

      • playSoldierCard

        public ClientModel playSoldierCard(HexLocation location,
                          int victimIndex)
        Description copied from interface: IServer
        This method will play a soldier card from a player's hand. A new ClientModel will be returned to the client.
        Specified by:
        playSoldierCard in interface IServer
        Pre-Condition:
        player has the specific card they want to play in their "old dev card hand", player hasn't played a dev card this turn, It's the player's turn, The current model status is "playing", The robber isn't being kept in the same place, The player to rob has cards (-1 if you can't rob anyone)
        Post-Condition:
        The robber is in the new location, The player to rob gives one random resource card to the player playing the soldier

      • playYearOfPlentyCard

        public ClientModel playYearOfPlentyCard(java.lang.String resource1,
                               java.lang.String resource2)
        Description copied from interface: IServer
        This method will play a year of plenty card from a player's hand. A new ClientModel will be returned to the client.
        Specified by:
        playYearOfPlentyCard in interface IServer
        Pre-Condition:
        player has the specific card they want to play in their "old dev card hand", player hasn't played a dev card this turn, It's the player's turn, The current model status is "playing", The two resources you specify are in the bank
        Post-Condition:
        Player gains the two resources specified

      • playRoadBuildingCard

        public ClientModel playRoadBuildingCard(EdgeLocation spot1,
                               EdgeLocation spot2)
        Description copied from interface: IServer
        This method will play a road building card from a player's hand. A new ClientModel will be returned to the client.
        Specified by:
        playRoadBuildingCard in interface IServer
        Pre-Condition:
        player has the specific card they want to play in their "old dev card hand", player hasn't played a dev card this turn, It's the player's turn, The current model status is "playing", The first road location is connected to one of your roads, The second road location is connected to one of your roads on the previous location, Neither location is on water, Player has two roads
        Post-Condition:
        Player uses two roads, The map lists the roads correctly

      • playMonopolyCard

        public ClientModel playMonopolyCard(java.lang.String resource)
        Description copied from interface: IServer
        This method plays a monopoly card from the player's hand. A new ClientModel will be returned to the client.
        Specified by:
        playMonopolyCard in interface IServer
        Pre-Condition:
        player has the specific card they want to play in their "old dev card hand", player hasn't played a dev card this turn, It's the player's turn, The current model status is "playing"
        Post-Condition:
        All other players lose the resource card type chosen, The player of the card gets an equal number of that resource type

      • playMonument

        public ClientModel playMonument()
        Description copied from interface: IServer

        Specified by:
        playMonument in interface IServer
        Pre-Condition:
        none
        Post-Condition:
        current player gains a victory point
